articles.description: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) has approved BioNTech’s Marburg site for COVID-19 vaccine production; which will become one of the largest mRNA vaccine manufacturing sites in Europe and the world. Elsewhere, additional sites are also set to produce AstraZ…
articles.title: EU gives BioNTech, AstraZeneca and Moderna green light for new COVID-19 production facilities - BioPharma-Reporter.com

articles.description: The European Union presented new emergency rules that will most likely severely cut exports to Britain and other countries to ease supply shortages at home.
articles.title: E.U. Will Curb Covid Vaccine Exports for 6 Weeks - The New York Times
